testcase.classname: US_003 Registration page should restrict password usage to a secure and high level passcode
testcase.name: TC_0301 Positiv Test at least 1 lowercase char for stronger password and see the level chart change accordingly
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici bir user olarak gmibank anasayfasina gider..................passed And Kullanici bir user olarak sag ust kosede bulunan insan simgesine tiklar.passed And Kullanici bir user olarak acilan menuden register linkine tiklar........passed Given bir user sent data to new Password Box "Betul2015." and verify the level chart.passed
